# 游끥 Contributors Leaderboard

Thank you to all our amazing contributors! This leaderboard tracks contributions based on merged pull requests.

## 游늵 Scoring System

- **Easy** (游릭): 4 points
- **Medium** (游리): 7 points  
- **Hard** (游댮): 10 points
